hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Underwater Left Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that shooting an #eye switch in Ganon's Shadow Trial# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Shadow Trial Eye Switch Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that King Dodongo dislikes smoke.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Forest Temple#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Why are they called Wallmasters if they come from the ceiling?

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #0# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Hylian Shield#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: These hints can be quite useful. This is an exception.
